definitions.definition: A perfect and/or early example of a particular style .
An artistic work of lasting worth , such as a film or song; a work of enduring excellence.
The author of such a work.

subdefinitions.definition: Any of the British Classic Races , five long-standing Group 1 horse races run during the traditional flat racing season.

definitions.definition: One learned in the literature of Ancient Greece and Ancient Rome ; a student of classical literature.

main_definition: A perfect and/or early example of a particular style .
secondary_definitions: An artistic work of lasting worth , such as a film or song; a work of enduring excellence.
The author of such a work.
( dated ) One learned in the literature of Ancient Greece and Ancient Rome ; a student of classical literature.
